column3: The backport of https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/commit/a4118c6e200e02e7560f8bc213697aa2909d95b1 here needs to be slightly different also. I've got a version you can pull in here: https://github.com/fanquake/bitcoin/commit/5d5cf12738d04f9212d3108f5afc5686fd361bad.
Thanks, ci macos cross build is green now
Dropped the build system change. This only contains some minor doc fixups. Can be merged or closed before rc2, no strong opinion.
